channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 10:49 Dumping anxiety in the Sumy region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 10:49 Dumping anxiety in the Sumy region.Creck on further messages.#Sumy_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 10:31 Fragrant anxiety in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kharkiv district
item.description: 🟡 10:31 Fragrant anxiety in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kharkiv district#m_harkiv_tha_tha_harkivska_harkivska_The. item.title: 🟡 10:30 alarm to Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district-Lipetsk territorial community- Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 10:30 alarm to Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district-Lipetsk territorial community- Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
